exec: pm.test('Template created and not idempotent', function () { pm.expect(body.idempotent).to.eql(false); });
pm.test('Status is 409 when no previous revision', function () { pm.response.to.have.status(409); });

description.content: Covers package template versioning and route fare revision workflows.
